entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as trying to iron his forehead and feeling shaky.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is sympathetic towards him and suggests going back to the common room.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of the Weasley twins, known for their joke shop merchandise and pranks.

entities.name: george
entities.description: The other Weasley twin, also involved in the joke shop business and demonstrations.

relationships.description: Hermione is being sympathetic towards Harry, suggesting they go back to the common room.
Fred and George are described as twins, indicating a brotherly relationship.
